name: infinite-resources-depletion
title: Infinite Resources - Depletion
author: Not All Me
description: It's ''endless-resources-depletion'' by Morhe, which was basically the only mod what did what expected and worked on every scenario correctly. Updated for 1.1, if he ever updates his version I'll delete this one. All resources are infinite but their yield will deplete to very low amounts. RSO & Bob's Mod compatible.
